author: ashtipliyski
body:
PR adds comparisons between the outputs of CALOL2 and inputs of uGT for the purpose of identifying issues with data links or corruption in the unpacking of data at uGT. Functionality is currently restricted to a single module under L1T/L1TStage2uGT folder and produces three plots: one summarising number of problems found, another for keeping track of absolute number of objects and their ratio.

Backport(s):
- #20947
title: Add DQM event by event comparison plots summarising CALOL2 outputs and uGT inputs
